titleInfo.title: Life of Father Isaac; Life of Father Iyosab; Life of (Father) Gäbrä Mäsih; Life of Father Samuel; F. Ir: [1] Gädlä ʾAbunä Yəshaq; (ገድስ፡ አበኅ፡ ይስሃቅ;) [2] Gädlä (ገድስ፡ አየሳብ) [3] Gädlä Gä/Mäsih Dagmawi; (ገድስ፡ ገ/መሊህ፡ ዳግማዊ) [4] Gädlä ʾAbunä Samuʾel; (ገድስ፡ አበኅ፡ ሳውአል)

subject.topic: Fathers of the church, Syriac.; Priesthood;

mods.note: f. 2v-16v: Life of Abunä Yəshaq; beginning lost; f.17r-f.40va: Life of Abunä Iyosab of Däbrä Garizan; f. 41r-f. 106v: Life of Abunä Gäbrä Mäsiḥ the Second (Abbot of GG); f. 107r - f. 136v: Life of Abunä Samuel (Abbot of GG);

originInfo.publisher: Monastery of Gunda Gunde, Ethiopia University of Toronto Scarborough Library; Hill Museum and Monastic Library, Collegeville, Minnesota

mods.accessCondition: Professor Michael Gervers, University of Toronto, Toronto, Ontario, Canada, Ewa Balicka-Witakowska, Uppsala, Sweden, and Father Columba Stewart, Hill Museum & Manuscript Library, Saint John’s University, Minnesota, U.S.A
